text: Faroe Islands national football team is the national football team of Faroe Islands. == Player records == ===Most appearances=== Rank Player Caps Goals Years 1 Fróði Benjaminsen 95 6 1999–2017 2 Óli Johannesen 83 1 1992–2007 3 Jákup Mikkelsen 73 0 1995–2012 4 Jóan Símun Edmundsson 66 7 5 Jens Martin Knudsen 65 0 1988–2006 6 Julian Johnsson 62 4 1995–2005 6 Gunnar Nielsen 62 0 2009–present 8 Jákup á Borg 61 2 1998–2010 9 Atli Gregersen 59 1 2009–2019 9 Hallur Hansson 59 5 2012–present ===Top scorers=== Rank Player Goals Caps Ratio Years 1 Rógvi Jacobsen 10 53 1999–2009 2 Todi Jónsson 9 45 1991–2005 3 Uni Arge 8 37 1992–2002 4 Jóan Símun Edmundsson 7 66 4 Klæmint Olsen 7 39 2012–present 6 John Petersen 6 57 1995–2004 6 Fróði Benjaminsen 6 95 1999–2017 6 Brandur Hendriksson 6 44 2014–present 9 Hallur Hansson 5 59 2012–present 10 Jan Allan Müller 4 34 1988–1998 10 Rógvi Baldvinsson 4 49 2011–present 10 Christian Holst 4 49 2003–2015 10 Julian Johnsson 4 62 1995–2006 10 ==References== Category:European national football teams Category:Football in Denmark Category:Faroe Islands Category:Organizations based in Denmark
